languages.text: Кассия — офицер и Навигатор вашего корабля. Она поражает врагов силами варпа и поддерживает отряд, усиливая союзников. {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказ командира{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} офицера, которая увеличивает характеристики выбранного спутника на один {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} и позволяет применять другие способности офицера на этом же спутнике на любом расстоянии. Чем выше {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} офицера, тем сильнее увеличиваются характеристики спутника. Повторно применить {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказ командира{/g} на одном и том же спутнике можно только через два хода после первого использования. {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Особое поручение{/g} — способность офицера, которая позволяет мгновенно предоставить союзнику {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}. Этот союзник не получает {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} в этом ходу, но получает 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, доступных для совершения атаки, использования расходных предметов или применения способностей. Если этот союзник находится под действием {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказа командира{/g} и уничтожает противника до того, как офицер закончит свой ход, он получает дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментум{/g} за это убийство. {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Пронзающий взгляд{/g} — особая атакующая способность, поражающая силами варпа все цели в широком конусе перед навигатором. Урон зависит от бонуса {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} навигатора. Все цели этой способности должны выполнить проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. При провале они окажутся {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушенными{/g}.
languages.original_text: Cassia is an Officer and your ship's Navigator. She strikes foes with energies of the warp and supports the party by making her allies stronger. {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} is an Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that increases an ally's characteristics for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and also allows the Officer to use their other Officer archetype abilities on that ally from any distance. The higher the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is, the more the target's characteristics are increased. An Officer can use {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} again on the same ally only after 2 rounds have passed since its first application. {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring It Down!{/g} is an Officer ability that lets them immediately grant an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to an ally. During that extra turn, the ally does not gain any {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}, but they do gain 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} which can be spent on making an attack or using abilities or consumables. If the ally is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} and destroys an enemy before the end of the Officer's turn, the ally will be granted extra {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g} for this kill. {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Lidless Stare{/g} is a unique damaging ability that assails all targets in a wide cone in front of the Navigator with warp energies. The damage dealt is based on the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} bonus. All creatures targeted by this ability must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

Урон зависит от бонуса {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} навигатора. Все цели этой способности должны выполнить проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. При провале они окажутся {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушенными{/g}.

The damage dealt is based on the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} bonus. languages.original_text: Кассия — офицер и Навигатор вашего корабля. Она поражает врагов силами варпа и поддерживает отряд, усиливая союзников. Приказ командира — способность офицера, которая увеличивает характеристики выбранного спутника на один ход и позволяет применять другие способности офицера на этом же спутнике на любом расстоянии. Чем выше бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} офицера, тем сильнее увеличиваются характеристики спутника. Повторно применить Приказ командира на одном и том же спутнике можно только через два хода после первого использования. Особое поручение — способность офицера, которая позволяет мгновенно предоставить союзнику {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}. Этот союзник не получает {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} в этом ходу, но получает 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, доступных для совершения атаки, использования расходных предметов или применения способностей. Если этот союзник находится под действием Приказа командира и уничтожает противника до того, как офицер закончит свой ход, он получает дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g} за это убийство. Пронзающий взгляд — особая атакующая способность, поражающая силами варпа все цели в широком конусе перед навигатором. Урон зависит от бонуса {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} навигатора. Все цели этой способности должны выполнить проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. При провале они окажутся {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушенными{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cassia is a Leader and your ship's Navigator. She strikes foes with energies of the warp and supports the party by making her allies stronger. Voice of Command is a Leader ability that increases an ally's characteristics for 1 round and also allows the Leader to use their other Leader doctrine abilities on that ally from any distance. The higher the Leader's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} bonus is, the more the target's characteristics are increased. A Leader can use Voice of Command on the same ally again only after 2 round have passed since its first application. Bring It Down! is a Leader ability that lets them immediately pass the turn to an ally. The ally does not gain any {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} for this extra turn, but they do gain a number of action points depending on the Leader's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} bonus. If the ally is under the effect of Voice of Command and destroys an enemy before the end of the Leader's turn, the ally will be granted extra {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} for this kill. Lidless Stare is a unique attack ability that assails all targets in a wide cone before the Navigator with warp energies. The damage dealt is based on the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} bonus. All creatures targeted by this ability must make a successful {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} test or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

Cassia is a Leader and your ship's Navigator. She strikes foes with energies of the warp and supports the party by making her allies stronger. Voice of Command is a Leader ability that increases an ally's characteristics for 1 round and also allows the Leader to use their other Leader doctrine abilities on that ally from any distance. The higher the Leader's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} bonus is, the more the target's characteristics are increased. A Leader can use Voice of Command on the same ally again only after 2 round have passed since its first application. Bring It Down! is a Leader ability that lets them immediately pass the turn to an ally. The ally does not gain any {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} for this extra turn, but they do gain a number of action points depending on the Leader's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} bonus. If the ally is under the effect of Voice of Command and destroys an enemy before the end of the Leader's turn, the ally will be granted extra {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} for this kill. Lidless Stare is a unique attack ability that assails all targets in a wide cone before the Navigator with warp energies. The damage dealt is based on the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} bonus. All creatures targeted by this ability must make a successful {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} test or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

Cassia is an Officer and your ship's Navigator. She strikes foes with energies of the warp and supports the party by making her allies stronger. Voice of Command is an Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that increases an ally's characteristics for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and also allows the Officer to use their other Officer archetype abilities on that ally from any distance. The higher the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is, the more the target's characteristics are increased. An Officer can use Voice of Command again on the same ally only after 2 rounds have passed since its first application. Bring It Down! is an Officer ability that lets them immediately grant an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to an ally. During that extra turn, the ally does not gain any {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}, but they do gain 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} which can be spent on making an attack or using abilities or consumables. If the ally is under the effect of Voice of Command and destroys an enemy before the end of the Officer's turn, the ally will be granted extra {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g} for this kill. Lidless Stare is a unique damaging ability that assails all targets in a wide cone in front of the Navigator with warp energies. The damage dealt is based on the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} bonus. All creatures targeted by this ability must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

Cassia is an Officer and your ship's Navigator. She strikes foes with energies of the warp and supports the party by making her allies stronger. Voice of Command is an Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that increases an ally's characteristics for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and also allows the Officer to use their other Officer archetype abilities on that ally from any distance. The higher the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is, the more the target's characteristics are increased. An Officer can use Voice of Command again on the same ally only after 2 rounds have passed since its first application. Bring It Down! is an Officer ability that lets them immediately grant an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to an ally. During that extra turn, the ally does not gain any {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}, but they do gain 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} which can be spent on making an attack or using abilities or consumables. If the ally is under the effect of Voice of Command and destroys an enemy before the end of the Officer's turn, the ally will be granted extra {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g} for this kill. Lidless Stare is a unique damaging ability that assails all targets in a wide cone in front of the Navigator with warp energies. The damage dealt is based on the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} bonus. All creatures targeted by this ability must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

Cassia is an Officer and your ship's Navigator. She strikes foes with energies of the warp and supports the party by making her allies stronger. Voice of Command is an Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that increases an ally's characteristics for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and also allows the Officer to use their other Officer archetype abilities on that ally from any distance. The higher the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is, the more the target's characteristics are increased. An Officer can use Voice of Command again on the same ally only after 2 rounds have passed since its first application. Bring It Down! is an Officer ability that lets them immediately pass the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to an ally. The ally does not gain any {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} for this {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, but they do gain a number of {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} depending on the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} bonus. If the ally is under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of Voice of Command and destroys an enemy before the end of the Officer's turn, the ally will be granted extra {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g} for this kill. Lidless Stare is a unique damaging ability that assails all targets in a wide cone in front of the Navigator with warp energies. The damage dealt is based on the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} bonus. All creatures targeted by this ability must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

languages.text: Cassia es una oficial y la Navegante de tu nave. Azota a los enemigos con las energías de la disformidad y apoya al grupo reforzando a sus aliados. {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voz de mando{/g} es una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de oficial que aumenta las características de un aliado durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} y además permite al oficial usar sus otras capacidades del arquetipo de oficial con ese aliado independientemente de la distancia. Cuanto mayor es la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} del oficial, más aumentan las características del objetivo. Un oficial solo puede usar {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voz de mando{/g} con un mismo aliado otra vez después de 2 asaltos desde el primer uso. {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}¡Derribadlo!{/g} es una capacidad de líder que le permite otorgar un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} a un aliado. Durante dicho turno, el aliado no gana {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g}, pero sí 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g} que puede gastar en atacar, usar capacidades o consumibles. Si el aliado se encuentra bajo los efectos de {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voz de mando{/g} y elimina a un enemigo antes de que termine el turno del oficial, el aliado recibe más {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g} por la muerte. {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Mirada sin párpados{/g} es una capacidad de ataque única que azota a todos los enemigos en un cono amplio delante del Navegante con energías de disformidad. El daño infligido depende de la bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} del Navegante. Todas las criaturas afectadas por esta capacidad deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidas{/g}.
languages.original_text: Cassia is an Officer and your ship's Navigator. She strikes foes with energies of the warp and supports the party by making her allies stronger. {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} is an Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that increases an ally's characteristics for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and also allows the Officer to use their other Officer archetype abilities on that ally from any distance. The higher the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is, the more the target's characteristics are increased. During that extra turn, the ally does not gain any {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}, but they do gain 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} which can be spent on making an attack or using abilities or consumables. If the ally is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} and destroys an enemy before the end of the Officer's turn, the ally will be granted extra {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g} for this kill. {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Lidless Stare{/g} is a unique damaging ability that assails all targets in a wide cone in front of the Navigator with warp energies. The damage dealt is based on the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} bonus. All creatures targeted by this ability must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cassia es una oficial y la Navegante de tu nave. Azota a los enemigos con las energías de la disformidad y apoya al grupo reforzando a sus aliados. Voz de mando es una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de oficial que aumenta las características de un aliado durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} y además permite al oficial usar sus otras capacidades del arquetipo de oficial con ese aliado independientemente de la distancia. Cuanto mayor es la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} del oficial, más aumentan las características del objetivo. Un oficial solo puede usar Voz de mando con un mismo aliado otra vez después de 2 asaltos desde el primer uso. ¡Derribadlo! es una capacidad de líder que le permite otorgar un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} a un aliado. Durante dicho turno, el aliado no gana {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g}, pero sí 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g} que puede gastar en atacar, usar capacidades o consumibles. Si el aliado se encuentra bajo los efectos de Voz de mando y elimina a un enemigo antes de que termine el turno del oficial, el aliado recibe más {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g} por la muerte. Mirada sin párpados es una capacidad de ataque única que azota a todos los enemigos en un cono amplio delante del Navegante con energías de disformidad. El daño infligido depende de la bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} del Navegante. Todas las criaturas afectadas por esta capacidad deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidas{/g}.

languages.text: カシアは士官であり、あなたの船の航宙士でもある。彼女は〈歪み〉のエネルギーを使って敵を攻撃し、味方を強くすることでパーティーをサポートする。 指揮の声は、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、味方の特性を強化し、また、どの距離からでもその味方に他の士官原則{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用できるようにする士官のアビリティである。士官の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が高いほど、ターゲットの特性もアップする。 士官は、指揮の声の初回使用から2ラウンドが経過すると、同じ味方に再び使用できる。 打ち倒せ！は、即座に味方に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を与える士官アビリティである。その追加ターンの間、味方は{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を獲得しないが、{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}を2ポイント獲得し、攻撃やアビリティ、消耗品に使用できる。 もし味方が指揮の声の効果下にあり、士官のターン終了前に敵を撃破した場合、その味方はこのスキルに対して追加の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}を得る。 凝視は、航宙士の前方の広い円錐の範囲にいるすべてのターゲットをのエネルギーで攻撃する独自のダメージアビリティである。与えるダメージは航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}ボーナスに基づく。このアビリティのターゲットとなるクリーチャーはすべて、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}状態になる。
languages.original_text: Cassia is an Officer and your ship's Navigator. She strikes foes with energies of the warp and supports the party by making her allies stronger. Voice of Command is an Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that increases an ally's characteristics for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and also allows the Officer to use their other Officer archetype abilities on that ally from any distance. The higher the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is, the more the target's characteristics are increased. An Officer can use Voice of Command again on the same ally only after 2 rounds have passed since its first application. Bring It Down! is an Officer ability that lets them immediately grant an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to an ally. During that extra turn, the ally does not gain any {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}, but they do gain 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} which can be spent on making an attack or using abilities or consumables. If the ally is under the effect of Voice of Command and destroys an enemy before the end of the Officer's turn, the ally will be granted extra {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g} for this kill. Lidless Stare is a unique damaging ability that assails all targets in a wide cone in front of the Navigator with warp energies. The damage dealt is based on the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} bonus. All creatures targeted by this ability must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

traits.locale_text: カシアは士官であり、あなたの船の航宙士でもある。彼女は〈歪み〉のエネルギーを使って敵を攻撃し、味方を強くすることでパーティーをサポートする。 指揮の声は、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、味方の特性を強化し、また、どの距離からでもその味方に他の士官原則{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用できるようにする士官のアビリティである。士官の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が高いほど、ターゲットの特性もアップする。 士官は、指揮の声の初回使用から2ラウンドが経過すると、同じ味方に再び使用できる。 打ち倒せ！は、即座に味方に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を与える士官アビリティである。その追加ターンの間、味方は{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を獲得しないが、{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}を2ポイント獲得し、攻撃やアビリティ、消耗品に使用できる。 もし味方が指揮の声の効果下にあり、士官のターン終了前に敵を撃破した場合、その味方はこのキルに対して追加の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}を得る。 凝視は、航宙士の前方の広い円錐の範囲にいるすべてのターゲットをのエネルギーで攻撃する独自のダメージアビリティである。与えるダメージは航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}ボーナスに基づく。このアビリティのターゲットとなるクリーチャーはすべて、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}状態になる。

カシアは士官であり、あなたの船の航宙士でもある。彼女は<歪み>のエネルギーを使って敵を攻撃し、味方を強くすることでパーティーをサポートする。 指揮の声は、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、味方の特性を強化し、また、どの距離からでもその味方に他の士官原則{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用できるようにする士官のアビリティである。士官の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が高いほど、ターゲットの特性もアップする。 士官は、指揮の声の初回使用から2ラウンドが経過すると、同じ味方に再び使用することができる。 打ち倒せ！は、即座に味方に{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を渡すことができる士官アビリティだ。この{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}の間、味方は{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を獲得しないが、士官の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}ボーナスに応じた数の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}を獲得する。 味方が指揮の声の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}下にあり、士官のターン終了前に敵を撃破した場合、その味方はこのキルに対して追加の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}を得る。 凝視は、航宙士の前方の広い円錐の範囲にいるすべてのターゲットをのエネルギーで攻撃する独自のダメージアビリティである。与えるダメージは航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}ボーナスに基づく。このアビリティのターゲットとなるクリーチャーはすべて、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶状態{/g}になる。

languages.text: 卡西娅是位军官，也是您的舰船上的导航者。她可以利用亚空间的力量攻击敌人，同时让她的盟友变得更加强大。 {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指挥之声{/g}是军官特有的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，这项能力可以在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内提高目标盟友的各项属性。此外，军官可以直接对受影响的盟友使用各种“军官”职业能力，无视与目标盟友的距离。军官的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}越高，目标的属性就会增加得越多。 当盟友受到{g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指挥之声{/g}影响后，军官需要等待两轮之后，才能再次对同一名盟友再次使用此能力。 {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}把它干掉！{/g}是军官的能力，可以立刻结束当前回合，让盟友获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}。盟友在这个额外回合中没有任何{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，但会得到+2{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，可用于攻击、使用能力或消耗品。 如果盟友受到{g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指挥之声{/g}的效果影响，且在军官的回合结束前消灭了任何敌人，则该盟友此次击杀会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}。 {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}无睑凝视{/g}是导航者的特殊能力，可以召唤亚空间的能量，攻击导航者面前大范围扇形区域内的所有目标。造成的伤害基于导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}加成。所有受到此能力影响的生物都必须进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，检定失败则会被{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}。
languages.original_text: Cassia is an Officer and your ship's Navigator. She strikes foes with energies of the warp and supports the party by making her allies stronger. {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} is an Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that increases an ally's characteristics for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and also allows the Officer to use their other Officer archetype abilities on that ally from any distance. The higher the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is, the more the target's characteristics are increased. An Officer can use {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} again on the same ally only after 2 rounds have passed since its first application. {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring It Down!{/g} is an Officer ability that lets them immediately grant an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to an ally. During that extra turn, the ally does not gain any {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}, but they do gain 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} which can be spent on making an attack or using abilities or consumables. If the ally is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} and destroys an enemy before the end of the Officer's turn, the ally will be granted extra {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g} for this kill. {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Lidless Stare{/g} is a unique damaging ability that assails all targets in a wide cone in front of the Navigator with warp energies. The damage dealt is based on the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} bonus. All creatures targeted by this ability must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 卡西娅是位领袖，也是您的舰船上的导航者。她可以利用亚空间的力量攻击敌人，同时让她的盟友变得更加强大。 指挥之声是领袖特有的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，这项能力可以在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内提高目标盟友的各项属性。此外，领袖可以直接对受影响的盟友使用各种“领袖”信条能力，无视与目标盟友的距离。领袖的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}越高，目标的属性就会增加得越多。 当盟友受到指挥之声影响后，领袖需要等待两轮之后，才能再次对同一名盟友再次使用此能力。 把它干掉！是领袖的能力，可以立刻结束当前回合，让盟友获得一个额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。盟友在这个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}中没有任何{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，但会得到一定的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，取决于领袖的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}加值。 如果盟友受到指挥之声的{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}影响，且在领袖的回合结束前消灭了任何敌人，则该盟友此次击杀会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}。 无睑凝视是导航者的特殊能力，可以召唤亚空间的能量，攻击导航者面前大范围扇形区域内的所有目标。造成的伤害基于导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}加成。所有受到此能力影响的生物都必须进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}抗性检定{/g}，检定失败则会被{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}。

languages.text: Cassia ist eine Offizierin und die Navigatorin deines Schiffes. Sie attackiert Feinde mit Energien des Warp und unterstützt die Gruppe, indem sie ihre Verbündeten stärker macht. {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Stimme des Kommandos{/g} ist eine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Offiziers, die die Eigenschaften eines Verbündeten 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang erhöht und dem Offizier erlaubt, andere Fähigkeiten des Offizier-Archetyps aus jeder Distanz auf diesen Verbündeten anzuwenden. Je höher der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Offiziers ist, desto stärker werden die Eigenschaften des Ziels erhöht. Ein Offizier kann {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Stimme des Kommandos{/g} erst wieder auf denselben Verbündeten anwenden, wenn seit der ersten Anwendung 2 Runden vergangen sind. {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring es zu Ende!{/g} ist eine Fähigkeit des Offiziers, mit der er einem Verbündeten sofort einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} gewähren kann. Der Verbündete erhält für diesen Zusatzzug keine {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g}, aber 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g}, die für Angriffe, Fähigkeiten oder Verbrauchsgegenstände benutzt werden können. Wenn der Verbündete unter dem Effekt von {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Stimme des Kommandos{/g} steht und vor dem Ende des Zugs des Offiziers einen Gegner ausschaltet, erhält er für diesen Kill zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g}. {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Lidloses Starren{/g} ist eine einzigartige Schadensfähigkeit, die alle Ziele in einem breiten Kegel vor dem Navigator mit Warp-Energien angreift. Der verursachte Schaden basiert auf dem {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-Bonus des Navigators. Alle Kreaturen, die von dieser Fähigkeit getroffen werden, müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} bestehen, um nicht {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} zu werden.
languages.original_text: Cassia is an Officer and your ship's Navigator. She strikes foes with energies of the warp and supports the party by making her allies stronger. {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} is an Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that increases an ally's characteristics for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and also allows the Officer to use their other Officer archetype abilities on that ally from any distance. The higher the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is, the more the target's characteristics are increased. An Officer can use {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} again on the same ally only after 2 rounds have passed since its first application. {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring It Down!{/g} is an Officer ability that lets them immediately grant an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to an ally. During that extra turn, the ally does not gain any {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}, but they do gain 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} which can be spent on making an attack or using abilities or consumables. If the ally is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} and destroys an enemy before the end of the Officer's turn, the ally will be granted extra {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g} for this kill. {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Lidless Stare{/g} is a unique damaging ability that assails all targets in a wide cone in front of the Navigator with warp energies. The damage dealt is based on the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} bonus. All creatures targeted by this ability must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cassia ist eine Offizierin und die Navigatorin deines Schiffes. Sie attackiert Feinde mit Energien des Warp und unterstützt die Gruppe, indem sie ihre Verbündeten stärker macht. Stimme des Kommandos ist eine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Offiziers, die die Eigenschaften eines Verbündeten 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang erhöht und dem Offizier erlaubt, andere Fähigkeiten des Offizier-Archetyps aus jeder Distanz auf diesen Verbündeten anzuwenden. Je höher der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Offiziers ist, desto stärker werden die Eigenschaften des Ziels erhöht. Ein Offizier kann Stimme des Kommandos erst wieder auf denselben Verbündeten anwenden, wenn seit der ersten Anwendung 2 Runden vergangen sind. Bring es zu Ende! ist eine Fähigkeit des Offiziers, mit der er einem Verbündeten sofort einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} gewähren kann. Der Verbündete erhält für diesen Zusatzzug keine {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g}, aber 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g}, die für Angriffe, Fähigkeiten oder Verbrauchsgegenstände benutzt werden können. Wenn der Verbündete unter dem Effekt von Stimme des Kommandos steht und vor dem Ende des Zugs des Offiziers einen Gegner ausschaltet, erhält er für diesen Kill zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g}. Lidloses Starren ist eine einzigartige Schadensfähigkeit, die alle Ziele in einem breiten Kegel vor dem Navigator mit Warp-Energien angreift. Der verursachte Schaden basiert auf dem {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-Bonus des Navigators. Alle Kreaturen, die von dieser Fähigkeit getroffen werden, müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} bestehen, um nicht {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} zu werden.

languages.text: Cassia est un officier et la navigatrice de votre vaisseau. Elle frappe ses ennemis avec les énergies du Warp et soutient le groupe en renforçant ses alliés. {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voix du commandement{/g} est une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} d'officier qui accroît les caractéristiques d'un allié pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} et permet également à l'officier d'utiliser ses autres capacités d'archétype d'officier sur cet allié, quelle que soit la distance qui les sépare. Plus le {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} de l'officier est élevé, plus les caractéristiques de la cible augmentent. Un officier ne peut réutiliser {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voix du commandement{/g} sur le même allié qu'au terme de 2 rounds suivant sa première application. {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Descendez-le !{/g} est une capacité d'officier qui lui permet d'octroyer un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} à un allié. L'allié ne gagne pas de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} pendant ce tour supplémentaire, mais reçoit 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g} qu'il peut dépenser pour exécuter une attaque, utiliser des capacités ou dépenser des consommables. Si un allié est sous l'effet de {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voix du commandement{/g} et élimine un ennemi avant la fin du tour de l'officier, cet allié bénéficiera de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue supplémentaire{/g} pour cette élimination. {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Regard sans paupières{/g} est une capacité unique qui inflige des dégâts à toutes les cibles situées dans un large cône devant le navigateur avec les énergies du Warp. Les dégâts infligés sont basés sur le bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} du navigateur. Toutes les créatures ciblées par cette capacité doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}, faute de quoi elles subiront l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g}.
languages.original_text: Cassia is an Officer and your ship's Navigator. She strikes foes with energies of the warp and supports the party by making her allies stronger. {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} is an Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that increases an ally's characteristics for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and also allows the Officer to use their other Officer archetype abilities on that ally from any distance. The higher the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is, the more the target's characteristics are increased. An Officer can use {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} again on the same ally only after 2 rounds have passed since its first application. {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring It Down!{/g} is an Officer ability that lets them immediately grant an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to an ally. During that extra turn, the ally does not gain any {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}, but they do gain 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} which can be spent on making an attack or using abilities or consumables. If the ally is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} and destroys an enemy before the end of the Officer's turn, the ally will be granted extra {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g} for this kill. {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Lidless Stare{/g} is a unique damaging ability that assails all targets in a wide cone in front of the Navigator with warp energies. The damage dealt is based on the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} bonus. All creatures targeted by this ability must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cassia est un officier et la navigatrice de votre vaisseau. Elle frappe ses ennemis avec les énergies du Warp et soutient le groupe en renforçant ses alliés. Voix du commandement est une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} d'officier qui accroît les caractéristiques d'un allié pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} et permet également à l'officier d'utiliser ses autres capacités d'archétype d'officier sur cet allié, quelle que soit la distance qui les sépare. Plus le {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} de l'officier est élevé, plus les caractéristiques de la cible augmentent. Un officier ne peut réutiliser Voix du commandement sur le même allié qu'au terme de 2 rounds suivant sa première application. Descendez-le ! est une capacité d'officier qui lui permet d'octroyer un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} à un allié. L'allié ne gagne pas de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} pendant ce tour supplémentaire, mais reçoit 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g} qu'il peut dépenser pour exécuter une attaque, utiliser des capacités ou dépenser des consommables. Si un allié est sous l'effet de Voix du commandement et élimine un ennemi avant la fin du tour de l'officier, cet allié bénéficiera de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue supplémentaire{/g} pour cette élimination. Regard sans paupières est une capacité unique qui inflige des dégâts à toutes les cibles situées dans un large cône devant le navigateur avec les énergies du Warp. Les dégâts infligés sont basés sur le bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} du navigateur. Toutes les créatures ciblées par cette capacité doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}, faute de quoi elles subiront l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g}.

languages.text: Cassia bir Subay ve geminin de Rotacı'sıdır. Düşmanları öteboyut enerjileriyle çarpar ve dost birimleri güçlendirerek grubu destekler. {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Emir Sözü{/g}, dost bir birimin niteliklerini 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} artıran ve ayrıca Subay'ın diğer Subay arketipi kabiliyetlerini herhangi bir mesafeden o dost birim üzerinde kullanmasına olanak tanıyan bir Subay {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetidir{/g}. Subay'ın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} ne kadar yüksekse hedefin nitelikleri de o kadar artar. Bir Subay, {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Emir Sözü{/g}'nü aynı dost birim üstünde ancak ilk uygulamasının üzerinden 2 raunt geçtikten sonra tekrar kullanabilir. {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Yere Ser!{/g}, bir dost birime anında bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandıran bir Subay kabiliyetidir. Dost birim, bu ek tur esnasında herhangi bir {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}hareket puanı{/g} kazanmasa da saldırı yapmak veya kabiliyet ya da sarf eşya kullanmak için harcanabilen 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}eylem puanı{/g} kazanır. Dost birim, Emir Sözü'nün etkisi altındaysa ve bir düşmanı Subay'ın turu sona ermeden öldürürse dost birime bu eylemi için ek {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g} verilir. {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Fal Taşı Bakış{/g}, Rotacı'nın önündeki geniş bir koni içindeki tüm hedeflere öteboyut enerjileriyle saldırarak hasar veren eşsiz bir kabiliyettir. Verilen hasar miktarı, Rotacı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} bonusuna bağlı olarak değişir. Bu kabiliyetin hedefindeki tüm yaratıklar {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmek zorundadır, yoksa {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlerler{/g}.
languages.original_text: Cassia is an Officer and your ship's Navigator. She strikes foes with energies of the warp and supports the party by making her allies stronger. {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} is an Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that increases an ally's characteristics for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and also allows the Officer to use their other Officer archetype abilities on that ally from any distance. The higher the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is, the more the target's characteristics are increased. An Officer can use {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} again on the same ally only after 2 rounds have passed since its first application. {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring It Down!{/g} is an Officer ability that lets them immediately grant an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to an ally. During that extra turn, the ally does not gain any {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}, but they do gain 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} which can be spent on making an attack or using abilities or consumables. If the ally is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} and destroys an enemy before the end of the Officer's turn, the ally will be granted extra {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g} for this kill. {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Lidless Stare{/g} is a unique damaging ability that assails all targets in a wide cone in front of the Navigator with warp energies. The damage dealt is based on the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} bonus. All creatures targeted by this ability must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cassia bir Subay ve geminin de Rotacı'sıdır. Düşmanları öteboyut enerjileriyle çarpar ve dost birimleri güçlendirerek grubu destekler. Emir Sözü, dost bir birimin niteliklerini 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} artıran ve ayrıca Subay'ın diğer Subay arketipi kabiliyetlerini herhangi bir mesafeden o dost birim üzerinde kullanmasına olanak tanıyan bir Subay {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetidir{/g}. Subay'ın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} ne kadar yüksekse hedefin nitelikleri de o kadar artar. Bir Subay, Emir Sözü'nü aynı dost birim üstünde ancak ilk uygulamasının üzerinden 2 raunt geçtikten sonra tekrar kullanabilir. Yere Ser!, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turun{/g} anında bir dost birime geçmesini sağlayan bir Subay kabiliyetidir. Dost birim bu {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} için herhangi bir {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}hareket puanı{/g} kazanmaz ancak Subay'ın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} bonusuna bağlı olarak bir miktar {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}eylem puanı{/g} elde eder. Dost birim, Emir Sözü'nün {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}etkisi{/g} altındaysa ve bir düşmanı Subay'ın turu sona ermeden öldürürse dost birime bu eylemi için ek {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g} verilir. Fal Taşı Bakış, Rotacı'nın önündeki geniş bir koni içindeki tüm hedeflere öteboyut enerjileriyle saldırarak hasar veren eşsiz bir kabiliyettir. Verilen hasar miktarı, Rotacı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} bonusuna bağlı olarak değişir. Bu kabiliyetin hedefindeki tüm yaratıklar {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} direnci {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testinden{/g} geçmek zorundadır, yoksa {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlerler{/g}.

Cassia bir Subay ve geminin de Rotacı'sıdır. Düşmanları öteboyut enerjileriyle çarpar ve dost birimleri güçlendirerek grubu destekler. Emir Sözü, dost bir birimin niteliklerini 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} artıran ve ayrıca Subay'ın diğer Subay arketipi kabiliyetlerini herhangi bir mesafeden o dost birim üzerinde kullanmasına olanak tanıyan bir Subay {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetidir{/g}. Subay'ın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} ne kadar yüksekse hedefin nitelikleri de o kadar artar. Bir Subay, Emir Sözü'nü aynı dost birim üstünde ancak ilk uygulamasının üzerinden 2 raunt geçtikten sonra tekrar kullanabilir. Yere Ser!, bir dost birime anında bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandıran bir Subay kabiliyetidir. Dost birim, bu ek tur esnasında herhangi bir {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}hareket puanı{/g} kazanmasa da saldırı yapmak veya kabiliyet ya da sarf eşya kullanmak için harcanabilen 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}eylem puanı{/g} kazanır. Dost birim, Emir Sözü'nün etkisi altındaysa ve bir düşmanı Subay'ın turu sona ermeden öldürürse dost birime bu eylemi için ek {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g} verilir. Fal Taşı Bakış, Rotacı'nın önündeki geniş bir koni içindeki tüm hedeflere öteboyut enerjileriyle saldırarak hasar veren eşsiz bir kabiliyettir. Verilen hasar miktarı, Rotacı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} bonusuna bağlı olarak değişir. Bu kabiliyetin hedefindeki tüm yaratıklar {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmek zorundadır, yoksa {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlerler{/g}.

languages.text: Кассия — офицер и Навигатор вашего корабля. Она поражает врагов силами варпа и поддерживает группу, усиливая союзников. Приказ командира — способность офицера, которая увеличивает характеристики выбранного спутника на один ход и позволяет применять другие способности офицера на этом же спутнике на любом расстоянии. Чем выше бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} офицера, тем сильнее увеличиваются характеристики спутника. Повторно применить Приказ командира на одном и том же спутнике можно только через два хода после первого использования. Особое поручение — способность офицера, которая позволяет мгновенно предоставить дополнительный ход союзнику. Этот союзник не получает {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} в этом ходу, но получает 2 ОД доступных для совершения атаки, использования расходных предметов, применении способностей. Если союзник находится под действием Приказа командира и уничтожает противника до того, как офицер закончит свой ход, он получает дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g} за это убийство. Пронзающий взгляд — особая атакующая способность, поражающая силами варпа все цели в широком конусе перед навигатором. Величина повреждений зависит от бонуса {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} навигатора. Все цели этой способности должны совершить проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} или стать {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушенными{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Кассия — офицер и Навигатор вашего корабля. Она поражает врагов силами варпа и поддерживает группу, усиливая союзников. Приказ командира — способность офицера, которая увеличивает характеристики выбранного спутника на один ход и позволяет применять другие способности офицера на этом же спутнике на любом расстоянии. Если союзник находится под действием Приказа командира и уничтожает противника до того, как офицер закончит свой ход, он получает дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g} за это убийство. Пронзающий взгляд — особая атакующая способность, поражающая силами варпа все цели в широком конусе перед навигатором. Величина повреждений зависит от бонуса {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} навигатора. Все цели этой способности должны совершить проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} или стать {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушенными{/g}.
